meaningMnemonic: I <kanji>believe</kanji> and <kanji>look up to</kanji> a higher power, for I have <vocabulary>religious faith</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for the 仰 portion is an exceptional one. Instead of ぎょう it's こう. Just remember, when it comes to religious faith, all you need to believe in is <reading>こう</reading>いち.
